title: Keeping a Journal
description: - Topics within the Life Balance series focus on maintaining positive mental health overall, rather than just dealing with problems.- Each book directly relates to the National Health Education Standards in addition to the Science and Social Studies standards.- Series has a fresh, sophisticated design and 2-color interior with illustrations.- Each book includes features and sidebars that highlight additional information of interest.National Social Studies Standards, Grades 5-8- Individual Development & Identity: IV- Describe personal connections to place--as associated with community, nation, and world.- Identify and describe the influence of perception, attitudes, values, and beliefs on personal identity.
author: Trudi Trueit
